mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no boardNo , b.board_title boardTitle , b.member_id memberId , b.board_create_date boardCreateDate FROM notice n INNER JOIN board b ON n.board_no = b.board_no WHERE b.board_privilege= 0 AND b.board_blind = 'N';

SELECT b.board_no boardNo , b.board_title boardTitle , b.board_content boardContent , b.board_blind boardBlind , b.member_id memberId , b.board_privilege boardPrivilege , b.board_create_date boardCreateDate , b.board_update_date boardUpdateDate FROM notice n INNER JOIN board b ON n.board_no = b.board_no WHERE b.board_privilege= 0 AND b.board_blind = 'N' AND n.board_no = ${boardNo};
